name: Jam Factory
description:
We couldn't manage to get this file working, so we reuploaded the game as downloadable if you want to give it a try: https://mcmgamestudio.itch.io/jam-factory-game.

Dodge fruits and punch your way through objects as you prevent the jam factory machinery from, well, jamming up.

Controls: Jump (W / up)   Duck (S / down)   Punch (K / X)

Coding, Artwork, SFX - DeadPieGamer

Music - TinyGod
